,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_id IN NUMBER
,idm_name_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (

);

END da_customer_login_idm_xref;

body.name: DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_IDM_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN_IDM_XREF
/* Generated on 11-FEB-15 05.09.40.559398000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_idm_xref.add(fx), parms=' || address_id || '|' || customer_login_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login_idm_xref a
(
a.address_id
,a.idm_name_id
,a.customer_login_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.address_id
,chtr.s_idm_name_id.NEXTVAL
,add.customer_login_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.idm_name_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_idm_xref.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_idm_xref.add, parms=' || address_id || '|' || customer_login_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login_idm_xref a
(
a.address_id
,a.idm_name_id
,a.customer_login_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.address_id
,chtr.s_idm_name_id.NEXTVAL
,add.customer_login_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_idm_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_id IN NUMBER
,idm_name_id IN NUMBER
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_idm_xref.add, parms=' || address_id || '|' || idm_name_id || '|' || customer_login_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login_idm_xref a
(
a.address_id
,a.idm_name_id
,a.customer_login_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.address_id
,add.idm_name_id
,add.customer_login_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_idm_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,idm_name_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login_idm_xref.del, parms=' || idm_name_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customer_login_idm_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.idm_name_id = del.idm_name_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login_idm_xref.del');

END del;

END da_customer_login_idm_xref;
